title: A News Anchor's Mom Goes Missing
summary: Nancy Guthrie, who is 84 years old and the mother of TV news anchor Savannah Guthrie, has gone missing from her home in Arizona. Police think she was taken away by someone and did not leave on her own. She was last seen at her house on Saturday evening, and her family reported her missing the next day. The sheriff says the scene at her home made them very worried. They are using drones, helicopters, and other tools to search for her. Nancy is not in good health but does not have memory problems. The police are asking people to call if they know anything. Savannah Guthrie thanked everyone for their support.
